page.title: 09Industry in Soham
page.content: In Soham there are many different types of industry.The commonest type is{building,}and there are over ten different firms.There is also a joinery and a woodyard. There are four firms that are associated with{farming.}Greens and Shropshires are both to do with processing and packing vegetables and The Hatchery breeds chickens.Fysons manufacture agricultural machinery. There are two firms who make {hydraulic equipment,}Collin Challis who make hose pipes and Parkers Hydraulics. Soham also has two firms making{bathroom furniture}and{kitchen {equipment.}Plaspertex makes paint. Soham has its own{pottery,}a {forge}and a{blacksmith.}Griggs is a haulage company on the out skirts of Soham,and there is also a sewage works.
